# tf.compat.v1.get_variable_scope


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r2.0/tensorflow/python/ops/variable_scope.py#L1365-L1368">

Returns the current variable scope.

``` python
tf.compat.v1.get_variable_scope()
```
